main event: A UFO was observed in Portland, Oregon, on 8 August 1962 for a duration of 2 seconds.
interesting points: The object was round and golden colored with a diameter of 40-50 feet., The object moved in an erratic manner and disappeared suddenly., Witness estimated the speed of the object at 500-600 mph., The sighting occurred in clear and calm weather conditions., The report was submitted 5 months after the sighting.
witness description: The witness saw the object from the ground and reported it 5 months later.
